actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of three Members on the part of the House to join with a like committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communication that he may be pleased to make.

summary.text: Provides for notification to the President that a quorum of each House of Congress is assembled.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of three Members on the part of the House to join with a like committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communication that he may be pleased to make.
